description:
Kanto Pokémon League:
Fifth Round - Vs Ash Ketchum
Zippo was Ritchie`s second choice Pokémon and was up against Ash`s Pikachu after it just defeated Ritchie`s Butterfree.
Zippo started by unleashing flamethrower attacks at Pikachu that struggled to avoid but Pikachu was showing that it was beginning to get tired. Zippo charged at Pikachu which connected and Pikachu was unable to continue.
Charizard originally appeared like it was not going to do anything but after Zippo narrowly missed with a flamethrower, Charizard decided to fight back with a flamethrower of its own which panicked Zippo and forced Ritchie to recall it.
Round Six - Vs Assumpta
Zippo battles against Assumpta`s Rhydon in the sixth round.
name: Hitokage (Hiroshi)
